roleset.name: try

example.name: sentential attempt
example.text: Mr. Nichol said he was `` extremely disappointed in the continuing deterioration of the company 's operations while it attempted to conclude the reorganization during the past four months . ''

propbank.arg: to conclude the reorganization during the past four months

example.name: nominal attempt
example.text: Investment bankers following UAL agree that the strongest impetus for an eventual deal is that the pilots have been attempting a buy - out for more than two years , and are n't likely to stop , having come so close to success .

example.name: autogen2
example.text: an attempt to speed deficit - reduction through Congress

propbank.arg: to speed deficit - reduction through Congress

example.name: One more with both args
example.text: Congress ' attempt to deny the president the funding necessary to execute certain of his duties and prerogatives specified in Article II of the Constitution .

propbank.arg: to deny the president the funding necessary to execute certain of his duties and prerogatives specified in Article II of the Constitution
